definitions.title: n. pr. loc.
definitions.body: city on E. border of Bashan, De 3:10, Jos 12:5, Jos 13:11 (all D), 1Ch 5:11; = Nab. [[עלתד]] (Lzb:358 Cook:101), mod. Ṣalḫad, Ṣarḫad, on S. spur of Jebel Hauran, c. 63 m. due E. of Jordan; cf. Buhl:Geogr. 252 Dr:De 3:10; LXX Selxa, Elxa, etc. (S lost often after e)/wv).
